mapper.insert: insert into com_gallery(mem_no, com_gallery_subject, com_gallery_content, com_gallery_count) values(#{mem_no},#{com_gallery_subject},#{com_gallery_content},#{com_gallery_count})
mapper.update: update com_gallery set mem_no=#{mem_no}, com_gallery_subject=#{com_gallery_subject},com_gallery_content=#{com_gallery_content}, com_gallery_count=#{com_gallery_count} where com_gallery_no=#{com_gallery_no}
mapper.select: select * from com_gallery where com_gallery_no>0 order by com_gallery_no desc, com_gallery_regdate desc
